name: ARD Audiothek
description: Fetches audiobook metadata from the ARD Audiothek (public broadcasters in Germany).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5, max: 20)

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: Search type: 'search' (default) for general search (preferred for single items) or 'programsets' for program set specific search (preferred for podcasts)

comments: Credits https://github.com/h43lb1t0/ARD_Audiothek_provider for inital idea in Python
